title: Indian banks have 'special plans' for offering higher deposit rates
description: Indian banks are increasing deposit rates, with offerings ranging from 6.90% to 7.30% for various durations. This comes after the RBI's directive to narrow the gap between deposit and credit growth. Banks aim to attract more retail deposits by providing higher interest rates amidst expectations of a changing rate cycle.
